StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: A skilled individual having capability to create software systems using Salesforce and CRM An IBM JAVA Certified Professional having hands-on experience on developing and designing database management systems according to requirements Skills to develop software solutions by studying information needs, conferring with users, studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes; possess practical knowledge on working with Apex, Python, C, C++, JavaScript (Basics) and HTML Understanding of Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) right from requirement analysis, documentation (functional specifications, technical design), coding and testing (preparation of test cases along with implementation) to maintenance of proposed applications Gained exposure in understanding process requirements and providing use cases for business, functional & technical requirements Excellent communication and presentation skills; worked as a team player and coordinated with team members
